footer.about_description: KisanMitra is an AI-powered platform helping Indian farmers with modern farming techniques, crop guidance, and market insights.

about.title: About KisanMitra
about.description: KisanMitra is your one-stop solution for all agricultural needs. Our platform connects farmers with experts, providing real-time insights, weather updates, and personalized recommendations to enhance farming practices.
about.mission_text: To empower farmers with technology-driven solutions for sustainable and profitable agriculture.

contact.subtitle: Connect with local ADOs for expert guidance

government.title: Government Agricultural Schemes
government.subtitle: Explore various government initiatives to support farmers
government.help_description: Contact your local agricultural office or call our toll-free number:

pm_kisan.title: PM-KISAN
pm_kisan.description: Direct income support of ‚Çπ6,000 per year to eligible farmer families
pm_kisan.eligibility: All landholding farmer families with cultivable landholding

fasal_bima.title: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana
fasal_bima.description: Comprehensive crop insurance scheme to protect farmers against crop failure
fasal_bima.eligibility: All farmers growing notified crops in notified areas

kisan_credit.title: Kisan Credit Card
kisan_credit.description: Provides farmers with timely access to credit
kisan_credit.eligibility: All farmers, sharecroppers, and agricultural laborers

soil_health.title: Soil Health Card Scheme
soil_health.description: Provides information on soil health and recommended fertilizers

pm_sinchai.title: PM Krishi Sinchai Yojana
pm_sinchai.description: Enhances water efficiency through 'Per Drop More Crop' and precision irrigation technologies
pm_sinchai.eligibility: Farmers seeking improved irrigation and water conservation

enam.title: National Agricultural Market (eNAM)
enam.description: Online trading platform for agricultural commodities to get better price discovery
enam.eligibility: Farmers, traders, and buyers registered on eNAM platform
